tooltips.gladiators.hiltless_horror: This powerful blade is just that: a blade! With no hilt, this sword hurts its wielder almost as much as its target!
tooltips.gladiators.spray_n_pray: Spray your enemy with, ummm something..., to damn them. Deals 2x damage to damned mobs.
tooltips.gladiators.baseball_bat: Smashing! Right click to bat away incoming projectiles. Deals 2x damage to arial mobs.
tooltips.gladiators.brickmerang: Brick, Brick, Brick, Brick! It's Fun.
tooltips.gladiators.bloblobber: idk what to put here yet
tooltips.gladiators.gay_ray: Shoot at an enemy to make them gay (Very distracting).
tooltips.gladiators.sacrificial_lamb: Summons a lamb to take damage for you. Yes, it is a metaphor for capitalism.
tooltips.gladiators.infinite_pizza: Infinite Pizza! Yummy! Too bad it has pineapples in it...
